mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS(SELECT name FROM artist WHERE instagram_id = #{instagramId} AND name = #{name});
SELECT name, profile, introduce, description, instagram_id, is_display, view, is_about, collaboration_date FROM artist WHERE instagram_id like concat('%', #{instagramId}, '%') LIMIT #{start}, #{end};
SELECT name, profile, introduce, description, instagram_id, is_display, view, is_about, collaboration_date FROM artist WHERE name like concat('%', #{name}, '%') LIMIT #{start}, #{end};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO artist(name, profile, introduce, description, instagram_id, is_display, collaboration_date) VALUES (#{name}, #{profile}, #{introduce}, #{description}, #{instagramId}, #{isDisplay}, #{collaborationDate});
